    • 方法详细资料

      • create

        public BlockingQueue<E> create(int capacity)
        从接口复制的说明: BlockingQueueFactory
        Creates a new BlockingQueue with the specified maximum capacity. Note that not all implementations of BlockingQueue support a bounded capacity in which case the value is ignored.
        指定者:
        create 在接口中 BlockingQueueFactory<E>
        参数:
        capacity - maximum size of the queue if supported
        返回:
        a new BlockingQueue

      • createFactory

        @PluginFactory
public static <E> DisruptorBlockingQueueFactory<E> createFactory(@PluginAttribute(value="SpinPolicy",defaultString="WAITING")
                                                                                SpinPolicy spinPolicy)
